column1: coalition_call_desc;Summon a grand coalition against a potential threat to the empire.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
coalition_end_desc;The war is going against us. You may decide to abandon the coalition if you wish.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
coalition_win_desc;The allies are winning. Perhaps we should abandon disputed territory to satisfy the greed of the coalition.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
convert_to_spouse_tao_desc;Convert to your spouse's Taoist beliefs;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
convert_to_spouse_confucian_desc;Convert to your spouse's Confucian beliefs;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
find_w_h_desc;Send men to find out where weapons and horses can be found.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
battle_challenge_desc;Challenge your opponent in the field to a duel.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
siege_challenge_desc;Challenge your opponent to come out and face you in a duel.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
make_noble_desc;Make [Root.GetTitledFirstName] a noble by giving [Root.GetHerHim] [Root.GetHerHis] own house and arms
column2: as well incomes to start [Root.GetHerHis] own household.;Faire de [Root.GetTitledFirstName] un noble en lui donnant une maisons et un blason
column3: ainsi que des revenus pour constituer sa maisonnée.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: adopt_character_desc;If you find this person to be of noble character
column2: perhaps they would make a useful addition to the clan? Adopting this person would make them a legitimate member of your dynasty.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: adopted_desc;This character was adopted into their house.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
commit_suicide_desc;Life has lost its meaning. Perhaps ending the pain would be easier?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
restore_emperor_in_luoyang_desc;The Emperor has lost control of his palace
column2: but it is within my power to restore the Palace City to him!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
a little bit of gold in the right hands goes a long way to make sure those at court do not judge you unfairly.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: protection_paid;The Emperor will hear of our generous tribute.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: you may choose to castrate him in order ensure his progeny does not one day taint the earth.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
you may choose to blind them.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: send_eunuch_desc;Send [Root.GetBestName] to serve the Imperial Court.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
send_lady_desc;Send [Root.GetBestName] to serve the Empress's Court.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: must unite. This act will bring glory to the once broken empire. You will go down in history as a great restorer.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: force_abdication_desc;Force the Emperor to abdicate. This action will formally make you Emperor of China. However
column2: many loyalists and opportunists may align against you for this.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the Imperial Capital should be yours to rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: make_luoyang_capital_desc;The city of Luoyang has seen better days
column2: but no one can deny its historical significance. If you so wish
column3: you may restore it as the capital of the Empire.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: luoyang_capital;Luoyang once more becomes the seat of imperial power.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
make_changan_capital_desc;The city of Changan has seen better days
column2: but no one can deny its historical significance. If you so wish
column3: you may restore it as the capital of the Empire.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: changan_capital;Changan once more becomes the seat of imperial power.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
make_imperial_capital_desc;The Emperor currently resides outside your capital. Perhaps we should move our headquarters to join the Emperor.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
imperial_capital;The Imperial capital becomes your base of power.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_emperor_desc;The Emperor has lost his seat of power. You have the reputation and strength necessary to aid the Empire in its time of need. Will you help?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
emperor_invited;The Emperor takes up residence in a vacant palace at your capital.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
call_exam_desc;The capital needs bureaucrats to run the country. Putting out an official call will draw talent from across the country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
launch_rebellion_desc;Our preparations have been made. The Han Dynasty is failing and we stand to gain much against their crumbling tyranny.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: you may take [Root.GetTitledFirstName] as your spouse.;Puisqu'[Root.GetSheHe] est votre prisonnier(ère)

column1: summon_empire_desc;We are under attack! We must summon the full might of the Kushan Empire to destroy our enemies!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
seek_refuge_desc;Seek isolation and refuge away from the chaos and war that disrupts the world today.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
hire_scholar_desc;There is always a potential that officers may be hidden away in your region. Perhaps venturing out to find a potential hidden genius is worth your time.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
make_mark_desc;Grant this character of good repute the noble rank of Marquis.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
make_duke_desc;Grant this character of good repute the noble rank of Duke.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
make_king_desc;Grant this character of good repute the noble rank of King.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
make_emp_desc;Abdicate your seat in favor of this powerful servant.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: you may feel that administrative life simply does not suit your tastes. Instead
column3: you can return your titles and insignias to your liege and form your own independent clan army for whatever purpose.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: demand_mass_conversion_desc;Your courtiers will hear your demand for mass conversion. This may cause them to become hostile towards you.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
hear_petition_desc;You have petitions from the people waiting for you. Hold court to settle them.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
take_clan_head_desc;You have enough standing to take leadership over your clan. Doing so will earn you prestige and authority within your dynasty.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
build_hospitals_1_desc;Pay a lump sum to construct Hospitals across your realm's provinces.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
